recipe.title: Halal Cart-Style White Sauce
instructions: Stir mayonnaise, yogurt, vinegar, pepper, sugar, dill, garlic powder, salt, and 1 Tbsp. water in a medium bowl.
Do Ahead Sauce can be made 5 days ahead. Store in an airtight container and chill.
